official-title.#text:
To direct the Administrator of the Small Business Administration and the Administrator of General
			 Services to make rules to streamline and simplify the registration system
			 used by small business concerns, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Open Government Technology Work to More Businesses Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Open Government Technology Work to More Businesses Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text: Regulations for business registration system to be considered for Federal contract

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Administrator of the Small
			 Business Administration

text.#text: Not later than 6 months after the date of enactment of this Act, the

to streamline and simplify the registration system used by small business concerns to be considered
			 for an award of any Federal contract;

that establish procedures by which a small business concern may self-certify its eligibility for a
			 Federal contract under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 8 of the Small Business Act

text.#text:
that establish procedures by which a majority of small business concerns may complete the
			 registration process not later than 4 weeks after beginning such process.
